Uses of Interface
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.SearchCriteria

  • Packages that use SearchCriteria 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap
    IMAP4rev2 server implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler
    Handler interfaces for the IMAP server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox
    Mailbox storage abstraction for mail access protocols.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.index
    Message indexing system for fast IMAP SEARCH operations.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.maildir
    Maildir format mailbox implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.mbox
    Mbox file format mailbox implementation.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SearchCriteria SearchParser.parse()
      Parses the input and returns the search criteria.

    • Uses of SearchCriteria in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox

      Methods in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox that return SearchCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.all()
      Matches all messages.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.and​(SearchCriteria... criteria)
      Combines multiple criteria with AND (all must match).
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.answered()
      Matches messages with the \Answered flag.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.bcc​(java.lang.String pattern)
      Matches messages with Bcc header containing the pattern.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.before​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Matches messages with internal date before the specified date.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.body​(java.lang.String pattern)
      Matches messages with body containing the pattern.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.cc​(java.lang.String pattern)
      Matches messages with Cc header containing the pattern.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.deleted()
      Matches messages with the \Deleted flag.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.draft()
      Matches messages with the \Draft flag.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.flagged()
      Matches messages with the \Flagged flag.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.from​(java.lang.String pattern)
      Matches messages with From header containing the pattern.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.hasFlag​(Flag flag)
      Matches messages with the specified system flag.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.header​(java.lang.String headerName, java.lang.String pattern)
      Matches messages with the specified header containing the pattern.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.keyword​(java.lang.String keyword)
      Matches messages with the specified keyword flag.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.larger​(long size)
      Matches messages larger than the specified size.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.newMessages()
      Matches messages that are recent and unseen (NEW).
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.not​(SearchCriteria criteria)
      Negates a criteria (matches if criteria does not match).
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.old()
      Matches messages that are not recent (OLD).
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.on​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Matches messages with internal date on the specified date.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.or​(SearchCriteria a, SearchCriteria b)
      Combines two criteria with OR (either must match).
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.recent()
      Matches messages with the \Recent flag.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.seen()
      Matches messages with the \Seen flag.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.sentBefore​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Matches messages with sent date before the specified date.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.sentOn​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Matches messages with sent date on the specified date.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.sentSince​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Matches messages with sent date on or after the specified date.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.sequenceNumber​(int number)
      Matches messages with the specified sequence number.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.sequenceRange​(int start, int end)
      Matches messages with sequence numbers in the specified range (inclusive).
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.sequenceSet​(int... numbers)
      Matches messages with sequence numbers in the specified set.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.since​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Matches messages with internal date on or after the specified date.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.smaller​(long size)
      Matches messages smaller than the specified size.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.subject​(java.lang.String pattern)
      Matches messages with Subject header containing the pattern.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.text​(java.lang.String pattern)
      Matches messages with headers or body containing the pattern.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.to​(java.lang.String pattern)
      Matches messages with To header containing the pattern.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.uid​(long uid)
      Matches messages with the specified UID.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.uidRange​(long start, long end)
      Matches messages with UIDs in the specified range (inclusive).
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.uidSet​(long... uids)
      Matches messages with UIDs in the specified set.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.unanswered()
      Matches messages without the \Answered flag.
      static SearchCriteria SearchCriteria.undeleted()
      Matches messages without the \Deleted flag.

      Matches messages without the \Draft flag.

      Matches messages without the \Flagged flag.

      Matches messages without the specified keyword flag.
